name: Diamond (Pinov Vox)
overview: This is a shoot 'em up in which you must guide your starship, Diamond through several enemy bases and do battle against the aliens. Stored on some of the alien bases are green pods. Pick those up for extra points. Extra lives are awarded for every 10,000 points scored. There might be an updated version later on, featuring a loading picture by Fabs. If this is the case, then this download will be replaced with the loading bitmap version Created by Pinov Vox using the Shoot 'em Up Construction Kit and released on both TND and the developer's own itch.io page on August 2, 2022.
